name: SURFA
description:
SURFA

SURFA is a shoot'em up game about a mouse on a boat.

STORY

He calmly sailed on a boat.
Until the birds and fish could smell the load he was carrying.
-------------
Shoot them all and save the load!

The game has a 20 levels.

CONTROLS

<- and -> - LEFT and RIGHT
↑ - AIM UP

Z - JUMP
X - SHOOT

POSTER VERSIONS

2$ - BLACK and WHITE version
3$ - COLOR version
